name: 結華
trans: (──Ahhh... What should I do...)

name: 結華
text:
（……大丈夫かな
昔みたいに話せなくなってたら……）
trans:
(...It'll be fine, right?
...But what if we can't talk like we used to...)

name: 結華
text:
（────いやいやいや！　平気だから！
そもそもそんな状態なら誘われてないだろうし──！）
trans:
(────No no no! Just keep it cool!
They wouldn't have asked for you in the 
first place if you weren't!)

name: 結華
text: ──久しぶり～！
trans: Long time no see!

name: 結華
text: ──なんて心配
trans: ──What was I worried about?

name: 一同
text: ごちそうさまでしたーっ
trans: That hit the spot!

name: 結華
text: （いらなかったわけだけど）
trans: (It was nothing to worry at all.)

name: 結華の友達１
text: うわっ、寒……！
trans: Whoa... It's freezing out here!

name: 結華の友達２
text: 中にいた分余計にダメだよね
trans:
It's because we've been inside with the heat the
whole time.

name: 結華の友達１
text: それ
trans: Yeah, that.

name: 結華の友達３
text: ねぇ待って待って駅ってどっち！？
trans: Wait, pause pause! Where's the station!?

name: 結華
text:
もう、来る時通ったんじゃないのー
こっちだよー
trans:
What, did you miss it when you came over?
It's right over thereー

name: 結華の友達３
text: さっすが三峰！
trans: Oh! That's Mitsumine for you!

name: 結華
text: まーたそう言っときゃいいと思って～
trans: You can say that again～

name: 結華の友達３
text:
久しぶりにいっぱい話せたし！　食べたし！
楽しかったねぇ
trans:
It's been ages since we've talked this much!
...Over food! That was fun!

name: 結華の友達１
text:
うん
ピザめっちゃ美味しかった、チーズ増しは正義
trans:
Yeah, the pizza was so damn good!
All that cheese did it justice.

name: 結華の友達２
text:
でもちょっと甘いもの足りなくない？
アイス食べるのどう思う？　みんなまだ時間ある？
trans:
But we're missing out on dessert, aren't we?
How about ice cream? You ladies up for it?

name: 一同
text: ある～～
trans: Let's gooo～

name: 結華
text:
コンビニ？
それとも奮発してアイス屋さん行っちゃう！？
trans:
To the convenience store? Or you down
to head over to the ice cream parlor!?

name: 結華の友達３
text:
────アイス屋さんで！
わたしら、もういい大人なわけですから……
trans:
────Duh! The ice cream parlor!
We're practically adults right about now...

name: 結華の友達１
text: まだ大学生なのに大きく出るじゃん
trans: Big talk coming from a college student.

name: 結華の友達３
text: いやこういうのは気分の問題でしょ！
trans: Hey, it's a matter of mind and spirit!

name: 結華の友人１
text: 帰り、アイス食べる人～？
trans: So who wants to eat ice cream on the way back?

name: 一同
text: はーい
trans: Meee!

name: 結華
text: ……ふふっ
trans: Ehehe...

name: 結華
text:
──……そういえば三峰、
この間もひとりで食べちゃったよ、寒い中買いに行って
trans:
...Oh, that's right. Just the other day, Mitsumine
went out in the freezing cold to buy some ice cream.

name: 結華の友達３
text: えっ、アイス愛好家がすぎる
trans: Wow, we got ourselves an ice cream addict here.

name: 結華
text:
いやいやいや
三峰にアイスの味を覚え込ませたのはみんなじゃん！
trans:
Oh come on! It's everyone's fault for showing
Mitsumine the doorway to ice cream paradise!

name: 結華の友達１
text:
言いすぎでしょ、
高校生になるまでアイス食べたことなかったのかって！
trans:
You're exaggerating!
You make it seem like you haven't had a
single bite of ice cream until high school!

name: 結華
text:
違うよ～～、もともと好きだけど『より美味しい』に
アップデートされたってことだよ～～！
trans:
Of course not～
I've always liked eating it. But high school was when
it ascended from "like" to a "whole 'nother level"!

name: 結華の友達２
text:
三峰こそ、そうやって調子いいこと
言っときゃいいと思って～
trans:
You hear that? Mitsumine's doing it again.
Music to my ears～

name: 一同
text: ──あははははっ
trans: ──Ahahaha!

name: 結華の友達１
text: ────……や～、変わんないね
trans: ───...Haaa, I'm glad you haven't changed.

name: 結華
text: えっ
trans: Huh?

name: 結華の友達１
text:
や、この間、バラエティ出てたの見たのよ
アンティーカでバス乗ってるやつ
trans:
I uh, saw you on TV doing that bus tour thing
with L'Antica the other day.

name: 結華の友達１
text:
寒そうだけど、すっごく楽しそうでさぁ
あれ見て改めて思ったんだよねぇ
trans:
It was cold out, but you really looked like you
were having a lot of fun. It got me thinking...

name: 結華の友達１
text: 三峰変わらないなぁ、って
trans: ...that you're still the same Mitsumine I know.

name: 結華の友達３
text:
わかる～！
ああいうロケの時、特に高校の時のまんまー
trans:
I totally agree～! When I watched, I was thinking that
Mitsumine hasn't changed a bit since when we were
in high school!

name: 結華の友達２
text:
いやあんたに言われるのはちょっとな……
って感じだと思うけども
trans: I dunno, I don't think you're the one to talk...

name: 結華の友達３
text: ええっ、なんで！？
trans: Ehhh, why?!

name: 結華の友達２
text: 一番成長してないから──
trans: 一...you're the only one here who hasn't matured.

name: 結華の友達３
text: こーらー！
trans: How ruuude!

name: 結華の友達１
text:
……まぁやかましいのはおいとくとして
馴染みの三峰だなぁって
trans:
...Anyways, what we're trying to say is that
we're glad you're still the Mitsumine that
we know and love.

name: 結華の友達２
text: おしゃべりが上手くて、つい聞いちゃう感じの
trans: That same one that I can listen to about anything.

name: 結華の友達３
text:
うんうん
段取りがしっかりしてて、つい任せちゃう感じの
trans:
Yeah, yeah. And the same one that's always prepared.
It makes me want to leave everything to you.

name: 結華
text:
──……いや、なんかいい感じ風にしてるけど、
段取りに関しては任せきりやめてくれていいんだけど！？
trans:
...The way you put it tells me everything. You're
not gonna stop letting me do all the work, huh?!

name: 結華の友達３
text: えー
trans: Ehhhh?

name: 結華
text: こらこらこら
trans: Don't you play dumb!

name: 結華の友達３
text: ふふふっ……！
trans: Hahahaha!

name: 結華の友達１
text:
……でもマジな話ね、
ちょっと怖かったりもしたのよ、これでも
trans: ...But honestly, I was bit scared doing this.

name: 結華の友達１
text:
変わらない三峰と──
もし、高校の時みたいに話せなくなってたらどうしよう
trans:
I mean, it's good you're the same as always,
but I was scared wondering if I could still talk to
you the same way I did back in high school...

name: 結華の友達１
text:
アンティーカのみんなといる時みたいに
楽しんでもらえなかったらどうしよう──とか
trans:
It's like, what if you didn't have as much fun with
us as you did with L'Antica?

name: 結華の友達１
text:
えへへ、ごめんねびびって
何せ友達が芸能人になった経験とかないものだから……
trans:
Ehehe, sorry for doubting. You became an
idol so suddenly... I wasn't sure how to act...

name: 結華の友達２
text: ごめん
trans: Sorry.

name: 結華の友達３
text: ごめんねー……
trans: Yup, sorry...

name: 結華
text: ──や、そんな……！
trans: Wait, that's...

name: 結華の友達１
text: ──でもほんと杞憂だったんだよ
trans: ───I know, we were worried for nothing.

name: 結華の友達１
text:
全然変わってなかった
集まった瞬間に、『これは高校だわ』って思って
trans:
Nothing's changed at all. The moment we came
together, it felt like high school all over again.

name: 結華の友達３
text:
うんうん
わたしたちアンティーカちゃんと張れるじゃん！　って
trans:
Yeah, yeah! Like, I'd say we're chummy enough
to give even L'Antica a run for their money!

name: 結華の友達２
text: 言いすぎ～
trans: That's a bit of a stretch～

name: 結華の友達３
text: えー！？
trans: Whaaa?!

name: 結華の友達１
text:
──……ほんとに全然変わらないから、安心した
三峰は三峰なんだなって
trans:
──It's a relief seeing that you haven't changed.
Mitsumine is still Mitsumine!

name: 結華
text:
……当ったり前じゃんね
いまさら何言ってんだか！
trans:
...Of course I haven't!
No need to keep saying that!

name: 結華
trans: Fu... Fufufu...

name: 結華
text: （──変わらない、か）
trans: (──The same as always, huh.)

name: 恋鐘
text: 結華～！
trans: Yuika～!

name: 結華
text: （────変わらないなら、それは）
trans: (──There are some things that never change...)

name: 結華
text: ふふふっ……！
trans: Ehehe...!
